fields_of_interest: Culture and media, Competition, Consumers, Single market, Digital economy and society
eu_initiatives:
- Digital single market (telecom regulation, roaming, net neutrality, spectrum, data protection, consumer rights…) 
- Antitrust and merger
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
goals__remit:
Iliad is one of the most important French telecom operator with over 20 million subscribers (both fixed and mobile). Although well-known as the French “maverick” (being the first to launch Triple Pay offers and cheap unlimited mobile offers), Iliad is also investing heavily and has great ambition for NGA deployments. 
Iliad is also MNO in the Italian market and will launch its mobile service in the first half of 2018.
